LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedSoySauce.stages.0.label: consumed soy sauce
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedSoySauce.stages.0.descriptio: Saltiness, moderate umami, sweet taste, and a very slight bitterness. Perfection.
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedWasabi.stages.0.label: breath of the dragon
LanguageData.VCE_ConsumedWasabi.stages.0.description: My whole nose burns! Please give me more.
LanguageData.VCE_AteSimpleSushi.stages.0.label: ate simple sushi
LanguageData.VCE_AteSimpleSushi.stages.0.description: Even the most basic sushi is a delicacy.
LanguageData.VCE_AteFineSushi.stages.0.label: ate fine sushi
LanguageData.VCE_AteFineSushi.stages.0.description: I ate a very fine sushi with some vegetables. Super tasty.
LanguageData.VCE_AteLavishSushi.stages.0.label: ate lavish sushi
LanguageData.VCE_AteLavishSushi.stages.0.description: I ate an incredible sushi dish. Delicious!
LanguageData.VCE_AteGourmetSushi.stages.0.label: ate gourmet sushi
LanguageData.VCE_AteGourmetSushi.stages.0.description: That... that was out of this world. The fish slices melted in my mouth. Just incredible.
LanguageData.VCE_AteFriedSushi.stages.0.label: ate deep fried sushi
